data.text: @SenTomCotton @SenTomCotton The time for "all options on the table" is over. Time to USE the options. Military support for Iran's freedom. NOW. NOT TOMORROW. NOW. #RezaPahlaviForIran #IRGCTerrorists #NoDealWithIRGC #IranMassacre

@SenTomCotton @SenTomCotton The regime is collapsing. Economy dead. Military weak. People revolting. One strong push and it's over. Don't miss this chance. MILITARY SUPPORT NOW. #IranMassacre #NoDealWithMullahs #NoDealWithIRGC #IRGCTerrorists #RezaPahlaviForIran

@SenTomCotton @SenTomCotton The Iranian people have shown they want freedom. 31 provinces rising. 30,000+ martyrs. All they need is help. GIVE IT TO THEM. Military support NOW. #IRGCTerrorists #NoDealWithIRGC #NoDealWithMullahs

@SenTomCotton @SenTomCotton Talking to the Islamic Republic legitimizes mass murder. Every negotiation extends their rule. Every deal buys them time. STOP TALKING. START ACTING. #RezaPahlaviForIran #NoDealWithMullahs #IranRevolution2026 #NoDealWithIRGC

@SenTomCotton @SenTomCotton Every negotiation with the Islamic Republic funds executions, prisons, and terror. Iranians are AGAINST it. Be on the right side. #NoDealWithMullahs #IRGCTerrorists #NoDealWithIRGC #RezaPahlaviForIran #IranMassacre

@SenTomCotton @SenTomCotton The cost of inaction is measured in Iranian bodies. Every day you delay, more die. Be decisive. Push for military action. The time is NOW. #RezaPahlaviForIran #NoDealWithMullahs #NoDealWithIRGC
@SenTomCotton PLEASE HELP US SHUT DOWN THE WINRED SCAM

@SenTomCotton @SenTomCotton You can sanction forever and the regime will adapt. Only military pressure creates real change. Support airstrikes on IRGC. Support the revolution. ACT.!!#IRGCTerrorists #NoDealWithIRGC #NoDealWithMullahs #RezaPahlaviForIran #IranRevolution2026
@SenTomCotton Curious what the going percentage rate for kickbacks in congress is.

@SenTomCotton @SenTomCotton The Islamic Republic doesn't represent Iran. It KILLS Iran. Iranians reject deals with torturers. END THIS...
#NoDealWithMullahs #IranRevolution2026 #RezaPahlaviForIran #IranMassacre
